name: Space Shootout (itch)
description:
Space Shootout is a two player split screen co-op game where two players on the same computer defend a cargo ship on its way to a space station from enemies that are randomly spawned. Each player controls a different ship that each has its own abilities, a shield ship and a gun ship.

The shield ship can produce a shield that reflects enemy bullets back at them and the gun ship can shoot bullets to destroy enemy ships. The cargo ship is destroyed after taking 5 hits so the players must work together to defend it.
